name: L0CKED
description:
Go through the adventures of playing as a square. Unlock yourself from the box, by speedrunning.

This game was made by me in about 4-5 Days. I made most of the assets myself except for the font, sounds and the music were from some previous games: Gain.

Controls:

  • A (Moves You Left), D (Moves You Right) to move, of course. You can use Spacebar to jump and S to dash. You can also use the arrow keys.
  • To go to the menu, click the escape key

3rd Party Assets Used:

  • Music
  • Font

This game was made using Python 3.9.1 and Pygame 2.0.1

You can also join my Discord Server if you have any questions:  https://discord.gg/GYRkPevG6u

The Game's GitHub: https://github.com/DevHedronYT/GameDev/tree/main/Python-GameDev/L0CKED

Game Devlog: 

 

Have fun playing!

If your on Windows, just download the L0CKED-Windows.zip file, then unzip it, go into the folder and run the .exe, remember to extract all the files otherwise you may get an error like,  "Failed to Execute Script Main" or something similar to the lines of this. Remember to keep the extracted files in the same folder. If it still does not work, maybe contact me if you can. You have to turn off antivirus as well or the game is deleted by the antivirus immediately for some reason.

To Contact me on Discord:
